title: Sandberg on State of Small Business
itunes:title: Sandberg on State of Small Business
description:
Facebook COO Sheryl Sandberg and Simi Adebajo, Owner of Eko Kitchen, discuss the state of small businesses amid the coronavirus outbreak. Sandberg says 11% of small businesses expect to fail in the next three months if COVID-19 conditions persist, according to a Facebook survey.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
